name: exec-if-updated
description: Command line utility to execute a command only if a set of source files have been updated since a set of target files."

scripts.prerelease: npm run clean && npm run compile
scripts.release:patch: npm version patch && npm run release
scripts.release:minor: npm version minor && npm run release
scripts.release:major: npm version major && npm run release
scripts.version: npm run compile && git add dist
